scripts.clean: rm -fr dist && rm -fr deploy && rm -fr node_modules && rm -fr package-lock.json && rm -fr yarn.lock
scripts.compile: tsc --project tsconfig.production.json --outDir dist --module esnext --target esnext --sourceMap false --declaration false --declarationMap false --removeComments true --noEmit false --strict true --noImplicitAny true --strictNullChecks true --strictFunctionTypes true --strictBindCallApply true --strictPropertyInitialization true --noImplicitThis true --alwaysStrict true
scripts.buildz: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o dist/index.min.mjs -- dist/index.mjs && gzip -9 -c dist/index.min.mjs > dist/index.min.mjs.gz
scripts.bundle:umd:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle -o dist/index.umd.min.js -- dist/index.umd.js && gzip -9 -c dist/index.umd.min.js > dist/index.umd.min.js.gz
